name: fconst2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2))))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2)))), wcel(c2, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2))))
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c2, universe), wb(wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2))))
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c2, universe), wb(wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2)))))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c2, universe), wb(wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2))))
-| wcel(c2, universe)

comment: A constant function expressed as a Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 20-Aug-1999.)
